
Various kinds of lists
**********************


nested enumerated lists
=======================

1. one

2. two

   1. two.1

   2. two.2

3. three


enumerated lists with non-default start values
==============================================

* zero

* one

======================================================================

1. one

2. two

======================================================================

2. two

3. three


enumerated lists using letters
==============================

1. a

2. b

3. c

4. d

======================================================================

24. x

25. y

26. z

27. {


definition lists
================

term1
   description

term2 (**stronged partially**)
   description
